ygData.subject: Lambent Perceptions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You have been quite generous with me already, sir. I ve noticed there is a line of perception somewhere between hearing people say Nice weapon. Where d
ygData.messageBody:
> I've got a lot of lambent quest items, which need to be fused
> and the product needs to be handed over to a deserving bard.

> Perhaps, we could work out a subquest for you. Maybe run
> some errands for me, pickup a few items I've been looking
> for. I believe I have spare BP components laying around.
> Footing a 250pp bill for jewels is asking a lot from a L20
> person, so I can cover the cost in return for your services.

> Harmonic.

You have been quite generous with me already, sir. I've noticed there is a
line of perception somewhere between hearing people say "Nice weapon.
Where'd you get that?" and "Hey, uber-twink, why do you need to group with
us newbies? Vox is that way!" I definitely prefer the former perception. ;)

A subquest for lambent could be entertaining. I do wish to feel I've earned
all the lambent armor I wear, and had envisioned beginning to group for the
bracer items in a couple levels and the other items later in my 20's. (Nice
to be in a bard-friendly guild now). I've seen high teen bards with lotsa
dough and connections that already have the lambent BP and other pieces, and
it seemed too soon to me. I would at least insist on paying for the jewels.
250pp would leave me absolutely broke. That, and a few laps around Norrath
getting items for a subquest would alleviate much of the "twink" guilt. :p

You're a fine HEF, Harmonic, nomatter what they say! =D

Operaman Overtone
<Spirit of the Moon>
Innoruuk
